## JsPlumbList class

Models a list of elements that is scrollable, and connections to the elements contained in the list are proxied onto the top of bottom edge of the list element whenever their source/target is not within the list element's current viewport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JsPlumbList 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [destroy()](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist.destroy) |  | Destroys the list, cleaning up the DOM. |
|  [newConnection(c, el, index)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist.newconnection) |  | Notification that a new connection concerning this list has been added. This is not a method that should be called as part of the public API; it is for the list manager to call. |
